label: Compteur de gaz
description: Read the gas consumption of an energy metering device

gasMeterPrecision.label: précision des mesures
gasMeterPrecision.description: the preciseness of the volume, gas, calorific and conversion attributes
gasMeterPrecision.displayTemplate: La {{attribute}} de {{device.label}} a été mise à jour

gasMeterCalorific.label: énergie calorifique
gasMeterCalorific.description: a measure of the available heat energy, used as part of the calculation to convert gas volume to gas energy.

gasMeterTime.label: heure du relevé de compteur
gasMeterTime.description: The timestamp when the measurement was taken

gasMeterVolume.label: volume de gaz
gasMeterVolume.description: the cumulative gas volume reported by the metering device.

gasMeterConversion.label: facteur de conversion
gasMeterConversion.description: the conversion factor used as part of the calculation to convert gas volume to gas energy. The value used for this calculation is generally defined by local regulations

gasMeter.label: mesure de gaz
gasMeter.description: the gas energy reported by the metering device
